bugs.error_description: Development omission fault (nonmalicious, software): missing userRepository.delete(existingUserEntity) → user persists in DB despite delete request, violating service contract (error in stored info state, potential integrity failure)
Development omission fault (nonmalicious, software): missing addressRepository.save(addressEntity) → address not persisted, returns un-saved entity (error in stored info state, content failure)

Development design fault (nonmalicious, software): raw SQL concatenation 'SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = \'' + username + '\'' → SQL injection vulnerability (interaction fault potential, high propagation to data breach failure)
Development omission fault (nonmalicious, software): unchecked userRepository.findByUsername(username).get() → NoSuchElementException on absent user (erratic failure mode during login)
Development omission fault (nonmalicious, software): unchecked addressRepository.findById(addressId).get() → NoSuchElementException if address absent (erratic failure instead of graceful 404)
Development omission fault (nonmalicious, software): missing @PreAuthorize on DELETE /{id} → unauthorized users can delete any user (authorization bypass, integrity failure)
Development algorithmic fault (nonmalicious, software): double passwordEncoder.encode() in update mapping → password hash mismatch post-update (authentication failure)
Development omission fault (nonmalicious, software): missing @Valid/@Validated on @RequestBody UserRequest in create → unvalidated input persists (potential data integrity error)
Development configuration fault (nonmalicious, software): @PostMapping(consumes="text/plain") with JSON DTO → body parsing failure (timing/request failure)
Development inefficiency fault (nonmalicious, software): userRepository.findAll() ignores Pageable → loads entire table into memory (performance degradation, potential halt failure at scale)
Development inconsistency fault (nonmalicious, software): new BCryptPasswordEncoder() instead of injected → potential encoding variance (dormant authentication mismatch)
